mapper.select:
SELECT hangup_code AS hangupCode, line_id AS lineId, org_code AS orgCode, SUM(is_cancel) AS isCancel, COUNT(call_id) AS totalCalls,
SUBSTRING(GROUP_CONCAT(phone_num),1,119) AS phoneNum, SUM(is_answer) AS answerCalls
FROM call_out_plan WHERE create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{enTime} AND call_state>6
GROUP BY hangup_code,line_id,is_cancel,org_code
